00053 void CD3DSettingsDlg::Init( CDXUTDialogResourceManager* pManager )
00054 {
00055     assert( pManager );
00056     m_Dialog.Init( pManager, false );  // Don't register this dialog.

00061 void CD3DSettingsDlg::CreateControls()
00062 {
00063     m_Dialog.EnableKeyboardInput( true );
00064     m_Dialog.SetFont( 0, L"Arial", 15, FW_NORMAL );
00065     m_Dialog.SetFont( 1, L"Arial", 28, FW_BOLD );
00066 
00067     // Right-justify static controls
00068     CDXUTElement* pElement = m_Dialog.GetDefaultElement( DXUT_CONTROL_STATIC, 0 );
00069     if( pElement )
00070     {
00071         pElement->dwTextFormat = DT_VCENTER | DT_RIGHT;
00072         
00073         // Title
00074         CDXUTStatic* pStatic = NULL;
00075         m_Dialog.AddStatic( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_STATIC, L"Direct3D Settings", 10, 5, 400, 50, false, &pStatic );
00076         pElement = pStatic->GetElement( 0 );
00077         pElement->iFont = 1;
00078         pElement->dwTextFormat = DT_TOP | DT_LEFT;
00079     }
00080 
00081     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER
00082     m_Dialog.AddStatic( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_STATIC, L"Display Adapter", 10, 50, 180, 23 );
00083     m_Dialog.AddComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER, 200, 50, 300, 23 );
00084 
00085     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE
00086     m_Dialog.AddStatic( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_STATIC, L"Render Device", 10, 75, 180, 23 );
00087     m_Dialog.AddComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE, 200, 75, 300, 23 );
00088 
00089     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED, DXUTSETTINGSDLG_FULLSCREEN

00093

00100     m_Dialog.AddComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION, 200, 205, 300, 23 );

00137 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnCreateDevice( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice )
00139 {
00140     if( pd3dDevice == NULL )
00141         return DXUT_ERR_MSGBOX( L"CD3DSettingsDlg::OnCreatedDevice", E_INVALIDARG );
00142 
00143     // Create the fonts/textures 
00144     m_Dialog.SetCallback( StaticOnEvent, (void*) this );
00145   
00146     return S_OK;
00147 }

00150 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 // Changes the UI defaults to the current device settings
00152 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::Refresh()
00154 {
00155     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00156 
00157     CD3DEnumeration* pD3DEnum = DXUTGetEnumeration();
00158     g_DeviceSettings = DXUTGetDeviceSettings();
00159 
00160     // Fill the UI with the current settings
00161     AddDeviceType( g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType );
00162     SetWindowed( FALSE != g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed );
00163     SetDeviceClip( 0 != (g_DeviceSettings.pp.Flags & D3DPRESENTFLAG_DEVICECLIP) );
00164     AddAdapterFormat( g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat );
00165     AddResolution( g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth, g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight );
00166     AddRefreshRate( g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz );
00167     AddBackBufferFormat( g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat );
00168     AddDepthStencilBufferFormat( g_DeviceSettings.pp.AutoDepthStencilFormat );
00169     AddMultisampleType( g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleType );
00170     AddMultisampleQuality( g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleQuality );
00171     
00172     if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE )
00173         AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE );
00174     else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00175         AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00176     else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00177         AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00178     else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00179         AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00180 
00181     AddPresentInterval( g_DeviceSettings.pp.PresentationInterval );
00182 
00183 
00184     CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pBestDeviceSettingsCombo = pD3DEnum->GetDeviceSettingsCombo( g_DeviceSettings.AdapterOrdinal, g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType, g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat, g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat, (g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed != 0) );
00185     if( NULL == pBestDeviceSettingsCombo )
00186         return DXUT_ERR_MSGBOX( L"GetDeviceSettingsCombo", E_INVALIDARG );    
00187 
00188     // Get the adapters list from CD3DEnumeration object
00189     CGrowableArray<CD3DEnumAdapterInfo*>* pAdapterInfoList = pD3DEnum->GetAdapterInfoList();
00190 
00191     if( pAdapterInfoList->GetSize() == 0 )
00192         return DXUT_ERR_MSGBOX( L"CD3DSettingsDlg::OnCreatedDevice", DXUTERR_NOCOMPATIBLEDEVICES );
00193     
00194     CDXUTComboBox* pAdapterCombo = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER );
00195     pAdapterCombo->RemoveAllItems();
00196 
00197     // Add adapters
00198     for( int iAdapter=0; iAdapter<pAdapterInfoList->GetSize(); iAdapter++ )
00199     {          
00200         CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = pAdapterInfoList->GetAt(iAdapter);
00201         AddAdapter( pAdapterInfo->szUniqueDescription, pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal );
00202     }
00203     
00204     pAdapterCombo->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr( g_DeviceSettings.AdapterOrdinal ) );
00205 
00206     hr = OnAdapterChanged();
00207     if( FAILED(hr) )
00208         return hr;
00209 
00210     //m_Dialog.Refresh();
00211     CDXUTDialog::SetRefreshTime( (float) DXUTGetTime() );
00212 
00213     return S_OK;
00214 }
00215

00217 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnResetDevice()
00219 {
00220     const D3DSURFACE_DESC* pDesc = DXUTGetBackBufferSurfaceDesc();
00221     m_Dialog.SetLocation( 0, 0 );
00222     m_Dialog.SetSize( pDesc->Width, pDesc->Height );
00223     m_Dialog.SetBackgroundColors( D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 98, 138, 206), 
00224                                          D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 54, 105, 192),
00225                                          D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 54, 105, 192),
00226                                          D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 10,  73, 179) );
00227     
00228     
00229     IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice = DXUTGetD3DDevice();
00230     pd3dDevice->BeginStateBlock();
00231     pd3dDevice->SetRenderState( D3DRS_FILLMODE, D3DFILL_SOLID ); 
00232     pd3dDevice->EndStateBlock( &m_pStateBlock );
00233 
00234     return S_OK;
00235 }
00236 
00237 
00238 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnRender( float fElapsedTime )
00240 {
00241     IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice = DXUTGetD3DDevice();
00242 
00243     // Clear the render target and the zbuffer 
00244     pd3dDevice->Clear(0, NULL, D3DCLEAR_TARGET, 0x00003F3F, 1.0f, 0);
00245 
00246     // Render the scene
00247     if( SUCCEEDED( pd3dDevice->BeginScene() ) )
00248     {
00249         m_pStateBlock->Capture();
00250         pd3dDevice->SetRenderState( D3DRS_FILLMODE, D3DFILL_SOLID ); 
00251         m_Dialog.OnRender( fElapsedTime );    
00252         m_pStateBlock->Apply();
00253         pd3dDevice->EndScene();
00254     }
00255     
00256     return S_OK;
00257 }

00262 {
00263     m_Dialog.MsgProc( hWnd, uMsg, wParam, lParam );
00264     if( uMsg == WM_KEYDOWN && wParam == VK_F2 )
00265         SetActive( false );
00266     return 0;
00267 }

00286 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00287 void WINAPI CD3DSettingsDlg::StaticOnEvent( UINT nEvent, int nControlID, 
00288                                             CDXUTControl* pControl, void* pUserData )
00289 {
00290     CD3DSettingsDlg* pD3DSettings = (CD3DSettingsDlg*) pUserData;
00291     if( pD3DSettings )
00292         pD3DSettings->OnEvent( nEvent, nControlID, pControl );
00293 }
00294 
00295 
00296 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 void CD3DSettingsDlg::OnEvent( UINT nEvent, int nControlID, 
00298                                CDXUTControl* pControl )
00299 {
00300     switch( nControlID )
00301     {
00302         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER:               OnAdapterChanged(); break;
00303         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE:           OnDeviceTypeChanged(); break;
00304         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED:              OnWindowedFullScreenChanged(); break;
00305         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_FULLSCREEN:            OnWindowedFullScreenChanged(); break;
00306         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT:        OnAdapterFormatChanged(); break;
00307         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION:            OnResolutionChanged(); break;
00308         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE:          OnRefreshRateChanged(); break;
00309         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_BACK_BUFFER_FORMAT:    OnBackBufferFormatChanged(); break;
00310         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEPTH_STENCIL:         OnDepthStencilBufferFormatChanged(); break;
00311         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_TYPE:      OnMultisampleTypeChanged(); break;
00312         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY:   OnMultisampleQualityChanged(); break;
00313         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_VERTEX_PROCESSING:     OnVertexProcessingChanged(); break;
00314         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_PRESENT_INTERVAL:      OnPresentIntervalChanged(); break;
00315         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICECLIP:            OnDeviceClipChanged(); break;
00316 
00317         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_OK:
00318         {
00319             if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed )
00320             {
00321                 g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = 0;
00322 
00323                 RECT rcClient;
00324                 if( DXUTIsWindowed() )
00325                     GetClientRect( DXUTGetHWND(), &rcClient );
00326                 else
00327                     rcClient = DXUTGetWindowClientRectAtModeChange();
00328                 DWORD dwWindowWidth  = rcClient.right - rcClient.left;
00329                 DWORD dwWindowHeight = rcClient.bottom - rcClient.top;
00330 
00331                 g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth = dwWindowWidth;
00332                 g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight = dwWindowHeight;
00333             }
00334 
00335             if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleType != D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONE )
00336             {
00337                 g_DeviceSettings.pp.Flags &= ~D3DPRESENTFLAG_LOCKABLE_BACKBUFFER;
00338             }
00339 
00340             DXUTCreateDeviceFromSettings( &g_DeviceSettings );
00341 
00342             SetActive( false );
00343             break;
00344         }
00345 
00346         case DXUTSETTINGSDLG_CANCEL:                
00347         {
00348             SetActive( false );
00349             break;
00350         }
00351 
00352     }
00353 }

00356 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00357 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::SetDeviceSettingsFromUI()
00358 {
00359     CDXUTComboBox* pComboBox;
00360     CDXUTRadioButton* pRadioButton;
00361 
00362     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE
00363     pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE );
00364     g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType = (D3DDEVTYPE) PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00365     
00366     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED
00367     pRadioButton = m_Dialog.GetRadioButton( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED );
00368     g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed = pRadioButton->GetChecked();
00369 
00370     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT
00371     pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT );
00372     g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat = (D3DFORMAT) PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00373     
00374 
00375     if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed )
00376     {
00377         g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat = D3DFMT_UNKNOWN;
00378         g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = 0;
00379     }
00380     else
00381     {
00382         // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_BACK_BUFFER_FORMAT
00383         pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_BACK_BUFFER_FORMAT );
00384         g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat = (D3DFORMAT) PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00385     
00386         // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION
00387         pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION );
00388         DWORD dwResolution = PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00389         g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth = HIWORD( dwResolution );
00390         g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight = LOWORD( dwResolution );
00391         
00392         // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE
00393         pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE );
00394         g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00395     }
00396 
00397     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEPTH_STENCIL
00398     pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEPTH_STENCIL );
00399     g_DeviceSettings.pp.AutoDepthStencilFormat = (D3DFORMAT) PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
00400     
00401     return S_OK;
00402 }

00423 CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* CD3DSettingsDlg::GetCurrentDeviceSettingsCombo()

00427                                              g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType,

00430                                              (g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed == TRUE) );

00434 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00435 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnAdapterChanged()
00436 {
00437     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00438 
00439     // Store the adapter index
00440     g_DeviceSettings.AdapterOrdinal = GetSelectedAdapter();
00441     
00442     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE
00443     CDXUTComboBox* pDeviceTypeComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICE_TYPE );
00444     pDeviceTypeComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00445  
00446     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = GetCurrentAdapterInfo();
00447     if( pAdapterInfo == NULL )
00448         return E_FAIL;
00449 
00450     for( int iDeviceInfo=0; iDeviceInfo < pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.GetSize(); iDeviceInfo++ )
00451     {
00452         CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.GetAt(iDeviceInfo);
00453         AddDeviceType( pDeviceInfo->DeviceType );
00454     }
00455 
00456     pDeviceTypeComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType) );
00457 
00458     hr = OnDeviceTypeChanged();
00459     if( FAILED(hr) )
00460         return hr;
00461 
00462     return S_OK; 
00463 }
00464

00467 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00468 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnDeviceTypeChanged()
00469 {
00470     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00471     
00472     g_DeviceSettings.DeviceType = GetSelectedDeviceType();
00473    
00474     // Update windowed/full screen radio buttons
00475     bool bHasWindowedDeviceCombo = false;
00476     bool bHasFullScreenDeviceCombo = false;
00477 
00478     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = GetCurrentDeviceInfo();
00479     if( pDeviceInfo == NULL )
00480         return E_FAIL;
00481             
00482     for( int idc = 0; idc < pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize(); idc++ )
00483     {
00484         CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceSettingsCombo = pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetAt( idc );
00485 
00486         if( pDeviceSettingsCombo->Windowed )
00487             bHasWindowedDeviceCombo = true;
00488         else
00489             bHasFullScreenDeviceCombo = true;
00490     }
00491 
00492     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED, DXUTSETTINGSDLG_FULLSCREEN
00493     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED, bHasWindowedDeviceCombo );
00494     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_FULLSCREEN, bHasFullScreenDeviceCombo );
00495 
00496     SetWindowed( g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed && bHasWindowedDeviceCombo );
00497 
00498     hr = OnWindowedFullScreenChanged();
00499     if( FAILED(hr) )
00500         return hr;
00501 
00502     return S_OK;
00503 }
00504 
00505 
00506 
00507 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00508 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnWindowedFullScreenChanged()
00509 {
00510     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00511 
00512     bool bWindowed = IsWindowed();
00513     g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed = bWindowed;
00514 
00515     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT_LABEL, !bWindowed );
00516     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION_LABEL, !bWindowed );
00517     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE_LABEL, !bWindowed );
00518 
00519     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT, !bWindowed );
00520     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION, !bWindowed );
00521     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE, !bWindowed );
00522     m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICECLIP, bWindowed );
00523 
00524     bool bDeviceClip = ( 0x0 != (g_DeviceSettings.pp.Flags & D3DPRESENTFLAG_DEVICECLIP) );
00525 
00526     // If windowed, get the appropriate adapter format from Direct3D
00527     if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed )
00528     {
00529         IDirect3D9* pD3D = DXUTGetD3DObject();
00530         if( pD3D == NULL )
00531             return DXTRACE_ERR( L"DXUTGetD3DObject", E_FAIL );
00532 
00533         D3DDISPLAYMODE mode;
00534         hr = pD3D->GetAdapterDisplayMode( g_DeviceSettings.AdapterOrdinal, &mode );
00535         if( FAILED(hr) )
00536             return DXTRACE_ERR( L"GetAdapterDisplayMode", hr );
00537 
00538         // Default resolution to the fullscreen res that was last used
00539         RECT rc = DXUTGetFullsceenClientRectAtModeChange();
00540         if( rc.right == 0 || rc.bottom == 0 )
00541         {
00542             // If nothing last used, then default to the adapter desktop res
00543             g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth = mode.Width;
00544             g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight = mode.Height;
00545         }
00546         else
00547         {
00548             g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth = rc.right;
00549             g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight = rc.bottom;
00550         }
00551 
00552         g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat = mode.Format;
00553         g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = mode.RefreshRate;
00554     }
00555 
00556     const D3DFORMAT adapterFormat = g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat;
00557     const DWORD dwWidth = g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth;
00558     const DWORD dwHeight = g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight;
00559     const DWORD dwRefreshRate = g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz;
00560 
00561     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEVICECLIP
00562     SetDeviceClip( bDeviceClip );
00563     
00564     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT
00565     CDXUTComboBox* pAdapterFormatComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT );
00566     if( pAdapterFormatComboBox == NULL )
00567         return E_FAIL;
00568     pAdapterFormatComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00569 
00570     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = GetCurrentDeviceInfo();
00571     if( pDeviceInfo == NULL )
00572         return E_FAIL;
00573 
00574     if( bWindowed )
00575     {
00576         AddAdapterFormat( adapterFormat );
00577     }
00578     else
00579     {
00580         for( int iSettingsCombo=0; iSettingsCombo < pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize(); iSettingsCombo++ )
00581         {
00582             CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pSettingsCombo = pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetAt(iSettingsCombo);
00583             AddAdapterFormat( pSettingsCombo->AdapterFormat );
00584         }    
00585     }
00586 
00587     pAdapterFormatComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(adapterFormat) );
00588 
00589     hr = OnAdapterFormatChanged();
00590     if( FAILED(hr) )
00591         return hr;
00592 
00593     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION
00594     CDXUTComboBox* pResolutionComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION );
00595     
00596     if( bWindowed )
00597     {
00598         pResolutionComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00599         AddResolution( dwWidth, dwHeight );
00600     }
00601 
00602     pResolutionComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr( MAKELONG(dwWidth, dwHeight) ) );
00603     
00604     hr = OnResolutionChanged();
00605     if( FAILED(hr) )
00606         return hr;
00607 
00608     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE
00609     CDXUTComboBox* pRefreshRateComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE );
00610     
00611     if( bWindowed )
00612     {
00613         pRefreshRateComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00614         AddRefreshRate( dwRefreshRate );
00615     }
00616     
00617     pRefreshRateComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(dwRefreshRate) ); 
00618 
00619     hr = OnRefreshRateChanged();
00620     if( FAILED(hr) )
00621         return hr;
00622 
00623     return S_OK;
00624 }
00625 
00626 
00627 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00628 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnAdapterFormatChanged()
00629 { 
00630     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00631 
00632     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_ADAPTER_FORMAT
00633     D3DFORMAT adapterFormat = GetSelectedAdapterFormat();
00634     g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat = adapterFormat;
00635 
00636     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION
00637     CDXUTComboBox* pResolutionComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION );
00638     pResolutionComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00639 
00640     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = GetCurrentAdapterInfo();
00641     if( pAdapterInfo == NULL )
00642         return E_FAIL;
00643 
00644     for( int idm = 0; idm < pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetSize(); idm++ )
00645     {
00646         D3DDISPLAYMODE DisplayMode = pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetAt( idm );
00647 
00648         if( DisplayMode.Format == adapterFormat )
00649             AddResolution( DisplayMode.Width, DisplayMode.Height );    
00650     }
00651 
00652     const DWORD dwCurResolution = MAKELONG( g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth, 
00653                                             g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight );
00654 
00655     pResolutionComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(dwCurResolution) );
00656 
00657     hr = OnResolutionChanged();
00658     if( FAILED(hr) )
00659         return hr;
00660 
00661     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_BACK_BUFFER_FORMAT
00662     CDXUTComboBox* pBackBufferFormatComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_BACK_BUFFER_FORMAT );
00663     pBackBufferFormatComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00664 
00665     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = GetCurrentDeviceInfo();
00666     if( pDeviceInfo == NULL )
00667         return E_FAIL;
00668 
00669     const BOOL bWindowed = IsWindowed();
00670     bool bHasWindowedBackBuffer = false;
00671 
00672     for( int idc = 0; idc < pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize(); idc++ )
00673     {
00674         CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo = pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetAt( idc );
00675         if( pDeviceCombo->Windowed == bWindowed &&
00676             pDeviceCombo->AdapterFormat == g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat )
00677         {
00678             AddBackBufferFormat( pDeviceCombo->BackBufferFormat );
00679             bHasWindowedBackBuffer = true;
00680         }
00681     }
00682 
00683     pBackBufferFormatComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat) );
00684 
00685     hr = OnBackBufferFormatChanged();
00686     if( FAILED(hr) )
00687         return hr;
00688 
00689     if( !bHasWindowedBackBuffer )
00690     {
00691         m_Dialog.SetControlEnabled( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_WINDOWED, false );
00692 
00693         if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed )
00694         {
00695             SetWindowed( false );
00696 
00697             hr = OnWindowedFullScreenChanged();
00698             if( FAILED(hr) )
00699                 return hr;
00700         }
00701     }
00702 
00703     return S_OK;
00704 }
00705 
00706 
00707 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00708 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnResolutionChanged()
00709 {
00710     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00711 
00712     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = GetCurrentAdapterInfo();
00713     if( pAdapterInfo == NULL )
00714         return E_FAIL;
00715 
00716     // Set resolution
00717     DWORD dwWidth, dwHeight;
00718     GetSelectedResolution( &dwWidth, &dwHeight );
00719     g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferWidth = dwWidth;
00720     g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferHeight = dwHeight;
00721 
00722     DWORD dwRefreshRate = g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz;
00723 
00724     // Update the refresh rate list
00725     CDXUTComboBox* pRefreshRateComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE );
00726     pRefreshRateComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00727 
00728     D3DFORMAT adapterFormat = g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat;
00729     for( int idm = 0; idm < pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetSize(); idm++ )
00730     {
00731         D3DDISPLAYMODE displayMode = pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetAt( idm );
00732 
00733         if( displayMode.Format == adapterFormat &&
00734             displayMode.Width == dwWidth &&
00735             displayMode.Height == dwHeight )
00736         {
00737             AddRefreshRate( displayMode.RefreshRate );
00738         }
00739     }
00740 
00741     pRefreshRateComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(dwRefreshRate) );
00742 
00743     hr = OnRefreshRateChanged();
00744     if( FAILED(hr) )
00745         return hr;
00746 
00747     return S_OK;
00748 }
00749 
00750 
00751 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00752 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnRefreshRateChanged()
00753 {
00754     // Set refresh rate
00755     g_DeviceSettings.pp.FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = GetSelectedRefreshRate();
00756 
00757     return S_OK;
00758 }
00759 
00760 
00761 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00762 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnBackBufferFormatChanged()
00763 {
00764     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00765 
00766     g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat = GetSelectedBackBufferFormat();
00767     
00768     D3DFORMAT adapterFormat = g_DeviceSettings.AdapterFormat;
00769     D3DFORMAT backBufferFormat = g_DeviceSettings.pp.BackBufferFormat;
00770 
00771     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = GetCurrentDeviceInfo();
00772     if( pDeviceInfo == NULL )
00773         return E_FAIL;
00774 
00775     bool bAllowSoftwareVP, bAllowHardwareVP, bAllowPureHardwareVP, bAllowMixedVP;
00776     DXUTGetEnumeration()->GetPossibleVertexProcessingList( &bAllowSoftwareVP, &bAllowHardwareVP, 
00777                                                            &bAllowPureHardwareVP, &bAllowMixedVP );
00778     
00779     for( int idc=0; idc < pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize(); idc++ )
00780     {
00781         CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo = pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetAt( idc );
00782 
00783         if( pDeviceCombo->Windowed == (g_DeviceSettings.pp.Windowed == TRUE) &&
00784             pDeviceCombo->AdapterFormat == adapterFormat &&
00785             pDeviceCombo->BackBufferFormat == backBufferFormat )
00786         {
00787             CDXUTComboBox* pDepthStencilComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEPTH_STENCIL );
00788             pDepthStencilComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00789             pDepthStencilComboBox->SetEnabled( (g_DeviceSettings.pp.EnableAutoDepthStencil == TRUE) ); 
00790 
00791             if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.EnableAutoDepthStencil )
00792             {
00793                 for( int ifmt=0; ifmt < pDeviceCombo->depthStencilFormatList.GetSize(); ifmt++ )
00794                 {
00795                     D3DFORMAT fmt = pDeviceCombo->depthStencilFormatList.GetAt( ifmt );
00796 
00797                     AddDepthStencilBufferFormat( fmt );
00798                 }
00799 
00800                 pDepthStencilComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(g_DeviceSettings.pp.AutoDepthStencilFormat) );
00801             }
00802             else
00803             {
00804                 if( !pDepthStencilComboBox->ContainsItem( L"(not used)" ) )
00805                     pDepthStencilComboBox->AddItem( L"(not used)", NULL );
00806             }
00807 
00808             hr = OnDepthStencilBufferFormatChanged();
00809             if( FAILED(hr) )
00810                 return hr;
00811 
00812             CDXUTComboBox* pVertexProcessingComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_VERTEX_PROCESSING );
00813             pVertexProcessingComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00814 
00815             // Add valid vertex processing types
00816             if( bAllowSoftwareVP )
00817                 AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00818 
00819             if( bAllowHardwareVP && pDeviceInfo->Caps.DevCaps & D3DDEVCAPS_HWTRANSFORMANDLIGHT )
00820                 AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00821 
00822             if( bAllowPureHardwareVP && pDeviceInfo->Caps.DevCaps & D3DDEVCAPS_PUREDEVICE )
00823                 AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE );
00824 
00825             if( bAllowMixedVP && pDeviceInfo->Caps.DevCaps & D3DDEVCAPS_HWTRANSFORMANDLIGHT )
00826                 AddVertexProcessingType( D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING );
00827 
00828             if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE )
00829                 pVertexProcessingComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE) );
00830             else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00831                 pVertexProcessingComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING) );
00832             else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00833                 pVertexProcessingComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING) );
00834             else if( g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags & D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING )
00835                 pVertexProcessingComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING) );
00836 
00837             hr = OnVertexProcessingChanged();
00838             if( FAILED(hr) )
00839                 return hr;
00840 
00841             CDXUTComboBox* pPresentIntervalComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_PRESENT_INTERVAL );
00842             pPresentIntervalComboBox->RemoveAllItems();
00843 
00844             for( int ipi=0; ipi < pDeviceCombo->presentIntervalList.GetSize(); ipi++ )
00845             {
00846                 UINT presentInterval = pDeviceCombo->presentIntervalList.GetAt( ipi );
00847                 
00848                 AddPresentInterval( presentInterval );
00849             }
00850 
00851             pPresentIntervalComboBox->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr( g_DeviceSettings.pp.PresentationInterval ) );
00852         
00853             hr = OnPresentIntervalChanged();
00854             if( FAILED(hr) )
00855                 return hr;
00856         }
00857     }
00858 
00859     return S_OK;
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00863 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00864 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnDepthStencilBufferFormatChanged()
00865 {
00866     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00867 
00868     D3DFORMAT depthStencilBufferFormat = GetSelectedDepthStencilBufferFormat();
00869 
00870     if( g_DeviceSettings.pp.EnableAutoDepthStencil )
00871         g_DeviceSettings.pp.AutoDepthStencilFormat = depthStencilBufferFormat;
00872 
00873     CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceSettingsCombo = GetCurrentDeviceSettingsCombo();
00874     if( pDeviceSettingsCombo == NULL )
00875         return E_FAIL;
00876     
00877     CDXUTComboBox* pMultisampleTypeCombo = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_TYPE );
00878     pMultisampleTypeCombo->RemoveAllItems();
00879 
00880     for( int ims=0; ims < pDeviceSettingsCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetSize(); ims++ )
00881     {
00882         D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE msType = pDeviceSettingsCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetAt( ims );
00883 
00884         bool bConflictFound = false;
00885         for( int iConf = 0; iConf < pDeviceSettingsCombo->DSMSConflictList.GetSize(); iConf++ )
00886         {
00887             CD3DEnumDSMSConflict DSMSConf = pDeviceSettingsCombo->DSMSConflictList.GetAt( iConf );
00888             if( DSMSConf.DSFormat == depthStencilBufferFormat &&
00889                 DSMSConf.MSType == msType )
00890             {
00891                 bConflictFound = true;
00892                 break;
00893             }
00894         }
00895 
00896         if( !bConflictFound )
00897             AddMultisampleType( msType );
00898     }
00899 
00900     CDXUTComboBox* pMultisampleQualityCombo = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_TYPE );
00901     pMultisampleQualityCombo->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleType) );
00902 
00903     hr = OnMultisampleTypeChanged();
00904     if( FAILED(hr) )
00905         return hr;
00906 
00907     return S_OK;
00908 }
00909 
00910 
00911 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00912 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnMultisampleTypeChanged()
00913 {
00914     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00915 
00916     D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE multisampleType = GetSelectedMultisampleType();
00917     g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleType = multisampleType;
00918 
00919     CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceSettingsCombo = GetCurrentDeviceSettingsCombo();
00920     if( pDeviceSettingsCombo == NULL )
00921         return E_FAIL;
00922 
00923     DWORD dwMaxQuality = 0;
00924     for( int iType = 0; iType < pDeviceSettingsCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetSize(); iType++ )
00925     {
00926         D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE msType = pDeviceSettingsCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetAt( iType );
00927         if( msType == multisampleType )
00928         {
00929             dwMaxQuality = pDeviceSettingsCombo->multiSampleQualityList.GetAt( iType );
00930             break;
00931         }
00932     }
00933    
00934     // DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY
00935     CDXUTComboBox* pMultisampleQualityCombo = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY );
00936     pMultisampleQualityCombo->RemoveAllItems();
00937 
00938     for( UINT iQuality = 0; iQuality < dwMaxQuality; iQuality++ )
00939     {
00940         AddMultisampleQuality( iQuality );
00941     }
00942 
00943     pMultisampleQualityCombo->SetSelectedByData( ULongToPtr(g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleQuality) );
00944 
00945     hr = OnMultisampleQualityChanged();
00946     if( FAILED(hr) )
00947         return hr;
00948 
00949     return S_OK;
00950 }
00951 
00952 
00953 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00954 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnMultisampleQualityChanged()
00955 {
00956     g_DeviceSettings.pp.MultiSampleQuality = GetSelectedMultisampleQuality();
00957 
00958     return S_OK;
00959 }

00961 
00962 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00963 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnVertexProcessingChanged()
00964 {
00965     DWORD dwBehavior = g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags;
00966 
00967     // Clear vertex processing flags
00968     dwBehavior &= ~D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING;
00969     dwBehavior &= ~D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING;
00970     dwBehavior &= ~D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING;
00971     dwBehavior &= ~D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE;
00972 
00973     // Determine new flags
00974     DWORD dwNewFlags = GetSelectedVertexProcessingType();
00975     if( dwNewFlags & D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE )
00976         dwNewFlags |= D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING;
00977 
00978     // Make changes
00979     g_DeviceSettings.BehaviorFlags = dwBehavior | dwNewFlags;
00980 
00981     return S_OK;
00982 }
00983 
00984 
00985 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00986 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnPresentIntervalChanged()
00987 {
00988     g_DeviceSettings.pp.PresentationInterval = GetSelectedPresentInterval();
00989 
00990     return S_OK;
00991 }
00992

00994 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00995 HRESULT CD3DSettingsDlg::OnDeviceClipChanged()
00996 {
00997     if( IsDeviceClip() )
00998         g_DeviceSettings.pp.Flags |= D3DPRESENTFLAG_DEVICECLIP;
00999     else
01000         g_DeviceSettings.pp.Flags &= ~D3DPRESENTFLAG_DEVICECLIP;
01001 
01002     return S_OK;
01003 }

01082 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01083 void CD3DSettingsDlg::AddResolution( DWORD dwWidth, DWORD dwHeight )
01084 {
01085     CDXUTComboBox* pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION );
01086   
01087     DWORD dwResolutionData;
01088     WCHAR strResolution[50];
01089     dwResolutionData = MAKELONG( dwWidth, dwHeight );
01090     StringCchPrintf( strResolution, 50, L"%d by %d", dwWidth, dwHeight );
01091 
01092     if( !pComboBox->ContainsItem( strResolution ) )
01093         pComboBox->AddItem( strResolution, ULongToPtr( dwResolutionData ) );
01094 }

01097 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

01099 {
01100     CDXUTComboBox* pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_RESOLUTION );
01101 
01102     DWORD dwResolution = PtrToUlong( pComboBox->GetSelectedData() );
01103 
01104     *pdwWidth = LOWORD( dwResolution );
01105     *pdwHeight = HIWORD( dwResolution );
01106 }

01109 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01110 void CD3DSettingsDlg::AddRefreshRate( DWORD dwRate )
01111 {
01112     CDXUTComboBox* pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_REFRESH_RATE );
01113         
01114     WCHAR strRefreshRate[50];
01115 
01116     if( dwRate == 0 )
01117         StringCchCopy( strRefreshRate, 50, L"Default Rate" );
01118     else
01119         StringCchPrintf( strRefreshRate, 50, L"%d Hz", dwRate );
01120 
01121     if( !pComboBox->ContainsItem( strRefreshRate ) )
01122         pComboBox->AddItem( strRefreshRate, ULongToPtr(dwRate) );
01123 }

01154 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01155 void CD3DSettingsDlg::AddDepthStencilBufferFormat( D3DFORMAT format )
01156 {
01157     CDXUTComboBox* pComboBox = m_Dialog.GetComboBox( DXUTSETTINGSDLG_DEPTH_STENCIL );
01158     
01159     if( !pComboBox->ContainsItem( DXUTD3DFormatToString(format, TRUE) ) )
01160         pComboBox->AddItem( DXUTD3DFormatToString(format, TRUE), ULongToPtr(format) );
01161 }

01268 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01269 // Returns the string for the given D3DDEVTYPE.
01270 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01271 WCHAR* DXUTD3DDeviceTypeToString(D3DDEVTYPE devType)
01272 {
01273     switch (devType)
01274     {
01275         case D3DDEVTYPE_HAL:        return L"D3DDEVTYPE_HAL";
01276         case D3DDEVTYPE_SW:         return L"D3DDEVTYPE_SW";
01277         case D3DDEVTYPE_REF:        return L"D3DDEVTYPE_REF";
01278         default:                    return L"Unknown devType";
01279     }
01280 }

01283 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01284 // Returns the string for the given D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE.
01285 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01286 WCHAR* DXUTMultisampleTypeToString(D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE MultiSampleType)
01287 {
01288     switch (MultiSampleType)
01289     {
01290     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONE:       return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONE";
01291     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONMASKABLE: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONMASKABLE";
01292     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_2_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_2_SAMPLES";
01293     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_3_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_3_SAMPLES";
01294     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_4_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_4_SAMPLES";
01295     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_5_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_5_SAMPLES";
01296     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_6_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_6_SAMPLES";
01297     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_7_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_7_SAMPLES";
01298     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_8_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_8_SAMPLES";
01299     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_9_SAMPLES:  return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_9_SAMPLES";
01300     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_10_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_10_SAMPLES";
01301     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_11_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_11_SAMPLES";
01302     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_12_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_12_SAMPLES";
01303     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_13_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_13_SAMPLES";
01304     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_14_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_14_SAMPLES";
01305     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_15_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_15_SAMPLES";
01306     case D3DMULTISAMPLE_16_SAMPLES: return L"D3DMULTISAMPLE_16_SAMPLES";
01307     default:                        return L"Unknown Multisample Type";
01308     }
01309 }

01312 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01313 // Returns the string for the given vertex processing type
01314 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01315 WCHAR* DXUTVertexProcessingTypeToString(DWORD vpt)
01316 {
01317     switch (vpt)
01318     {
01319     case D3DCREATE_SOFTWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING: return L"Software vertex processing";
01320     case D3DCREATE_MIXED_VERTEXPROCESSING:    return L"Mixed vertex processing";
01321     case D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING: return L"Hardware vertex processing";
01322     case D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE:                return L"Pure hardware vertex processing";
01323     default:                                  return L"Unknown vertex processing type";
01324     }
01325 }

01328 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01329 // Returns the string for the given present interval.
01330 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01331 WCHAR* DXUTPresentIntervalToString( UINT pi )
01332 {
01333     switch( pi )
01334     {
01335     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_IMMEDIATE: return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_IMMEDIATE";
01336     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_DEFAULT:   return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_DEFAULT";
01337     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_ONE:       return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_ONE";
01338     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_TWO:       return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_TWO";
01339     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_THREE:     return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_THREE";
01340     case D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_FOUR:      return L"D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_FOUR";
01341     default:                            return L"Unknown PresentInterval";
01342     }
01343 }
